summary: This document details the seizure of real property associated with Jeffrey Epstein, specifically located at 9 East 71st Street, New York, NY. It outlines the legal context for the seizure, including references to relevant statutes and the involvement of various attorneys representing the estate of Epstein.

events.title: Notice of Pendency Filed

keyFacts: The document details the seizure of real property associated with Jeffrey Epstein located at 9 East 71st Street, New York, NY.
Multiple attorneys are listed as representing the estate of Jeffrey Epstein.
A notice of pendency was filed on July 11, 2019, related to the seizure.
The document references various legal statutes under which the seizure is being conducted.
There are several agents and staff members involved in the documentation and seizure process.
